isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).details: MUST return the correct magic value if the signature provided is valid for the provided hash   > The bytes4 magic value to return when signature is valid is 0x1626ba7e : bytes4(keccak256("isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes)")   > This function MAY modify Ethereum's state

returns.magicValue: Magic value 0x1626ba7e if the signature is valid and 0x0 otherwise

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: Verifies whether the provided signature is valid with respect to the provided hash
